portfolio-about-section-about-paragraph-: My name is Evgeniy Vashchuk, and I am a seasoned Front-end Developer from Ukraine with more than seven years of extensive experience. Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in web-development, ensuring that I can create clean, maintainable, and responsive web interfaces.

My ability to collaborate with UX/UI designers and Back-end developers has allowed me to deliver comprehensive and user-friendly web solutions. My goal is to leverage my diverse skill set to continue creating exceptional user experiences and drive the success of future projects. I am inspired by creating great work with people who want to building something awesome!
portfolio-about-section-skills-paragraph: Main area of my expertise is front end development and everything related with this side of the web.
portfolio-about-section-technologies-par: Here is a selection of relevant technologies that I have experience with:
portfolio-about-section-services-list-7: Creation of e-commerce based on WooCommerce
portfolio-about-section-experience-item-: Courses – Developing web applications with JavaScript.
Developed fully functional responsive websites using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and JQuery. Developed and support websites for different companies using Wordpress (CMS).
Worked with e-commerce projects built on Magento. Communicated with back-end developers to solve tasks of the project.
Developed websites and worked with WordPress and Squarespace CMS. Tested front-end code in multiple browsers to ensure crossbrowser compatability.
Developed user-friendly web interfaces. Collaborated with back-end developers and designers to implement responsive design and enhance the functionality of the company's web applications.
portfolio-contacts-form-title: If you wanna get in touch, talk to me about a project collaboration or just say hi, fill up the awesome form below:
portfolio-contacts-form-validation-email: Please enter a valid email address.
portfolio-project-section-description-mo: It is corporate web-site for IT company from Italy. The site was build on Laravel. It is user-friendly website that meets the IT company's needs and supports its business objectives.
portfolio-project-section-description-ce: This is medium size project - corporate web site for the firm that specializing in professional, legally defensible workplace investigations. Build on WordPress.
portfolio-project-section-description-ka: This landing-page was developed for the presentation of an electronic product - portable SSD. Site includes many different animations and effects.
portfolio-project-section-description-fa: This is online store website of pharmacy and perfumery in Italy. It was build on WordPress CMS with WooCommerce plugin.
portfolio-project-section-description-wa: This is a website for a marketing company, that included several pages and some small animations. Was made on WordPress.
portfolio-project-section-description-ad: This site was developed for photographer in order to show his work. All site is in minimalist design along with animation transitions between viewing and selecting photos.
portfolio-project-section-description-wi: It is corporate web-site based on WordPress. It includes svg-animations, sliders and multilingual.
portfolio-project-section-description-hu: This is a corporate website to represent the big logistics company. Made in modern design with light animations. Build on WordPress.
